title: Committed Zina, got married but forgot to repent, Will Allah forgive us? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: an anonymous person says if a boy and a girl fornicated before marriage and after some years they got married they forgot to repent from their earlier sins there's a law for give them the answer is yes allah subhana wa ta'ala forgives everyone who comes to him depending with a heart filled with remorse no matter what your sin is even if you kill all of humanity if you come in repentance to Allah with a heart filled of remorse and you seek his forgiveness Allah will forgive you so insha'Allah think positive of Allah and don't worry
